The Bathroom, she was bringing you with.
153.content:
You decide the Giant Girl shopping would be a great person to get attention from, She looked like she wouldn't hurt you. You start to begin your long way towards her, Running on the slippery mall floor.

You looked at her as you ran, She was just shopping my herself. She was humming to herself and looking at products like she was just browsing. She looked to be about 6 feet tall, an inch shorter than your normal height. She looked like a straight up Model too, She had Brown hair, blue eyes, Curves with a slim bodybuild and tan skin. You guessed that she was about 18 years old which was 2 years older than you. She was wearing a Watermelon Red Short Sundress with a purple Bikini under it and brown foam flip-flops.

You were probably only running 10 feet but it felt like forever but you eventually make it to her, looking up as she is towering over you. You look at her and decide how you were gonna get her attention, maybe tapping on her toes might work? You walk over and hit one of her toes hoping she would notice you.

To your surprise she actually looks down right at you, "Is that a tiny person?" She says in a confused tone as she bends down to pick you up. "Oh my god, it is!" She smiles holding you up to her face.

"Please, I just shrunk! You have to help me!" You say to the Giant Girl's face in front of you.

"Oh my gosh, you're so tiny! Like a little pin." She cooed at you. "My name is Hailie and yours?"

"Uh, Denis." You say confused why she ignored you. "Can you please help me?"

"You don't need help, You're Tiny! I could easily just squish you!" She giggles. She then looks at her stomach, "Oh I'm so hungry right now, I wish I could eat something." She says smiling some more. "You're so tiny, I could eat you up!" She smiles mischievously.

"Let's go somewhere first." She says closing you in her fist and she starts looking around. Where does she go?
153.title: Giantess Hailie

choices: Wait next on the shelf, someone might see you.
You jump trying to land on a Girl passing by.
It was desperate, but you climb inside a Sun Screen bottle.
154.content:
You needed to think quick, you looked over at your Sun Screen Bottle that was on its side and got an idea. You ran over and jumped onto it, standing there hoping the next person to come by would see it.

It was a white bottle so anyone looking at it could probably see you, hopefully they would at least. You couldn't believe you shrunk, how was this even physically possible? It went against most basic laws of atomic structure. But you shook it out of your head, You need better things to think of now.

Suddenly you hear loud booms as someone walks around the corner, It was an employee. She kept walking in your direction and saw the Sun Screen on the ground lying around carelessly. She sighs in anger as she reaches down to pick it up, This was your time to get her attention. "Hel-" Is all you can let out before she grabs the bottle wrapping one of her fingers right on you as she picks it up.

You were pinned against her finger, this really wasn't your plan. She stands up and walks over to where you had gotten the bottle and places you and your bottle back onto the shelf. You jump off, looking at her walking away.

"Wait! I'm still here! Help!" You yell but it's not use, she walks away and all you can hear is her thunderous booms of footsteps get quieter. You look over the edge, you were high up on a shelf. There was no way you'd be able to get down from here, you'd probably break all your bones in your body if you jumped.

You needed a plan now, There was a good chance people would be walking past your shelf, what do you decide on doing?
154.title: Holding Onto The Giant Sun Screen

choices: Inside a Bra cup, a pretty big bra too.
In a lipstick container, hopefully you don't get inside it.
Inside the changing room, there was a long line for it.
155.content:
You knew there was a store nearby this one that had way more people in it from what it sounded like, maybe it would increase the chances of being noticed in there. You remember walking past the store but you didn't remember what it was again, but you decide you should go over there anyway.

You run across the ground at half an inch tall, the distance to the door to you have like 5 football fields. You hear the loud booms of footsteps in the distance as some shoppers were looking at items, they sounded terrifying to you. As you were running you had to stop running to let a Giant girl pass you so she wouldn't be running over you, then you kept going. It was exhausting to run this long when at normal size it would just be a 20-second walk for you.

You eventually reach the end of the store and run right out of the entrance into the mall, you look around at people going in and out of stores. You see the other store entrance very nearby and you run over to it and walk in, you looked around realizing this was a Women clothing and lingerie store. You knew it was awkward to be in here but you were more likely to be noticed, you walk over to a Giant employee who was stacking stuff right away.

"Help! Can you hear me! I'm shrunk! Down here!" You yell up at the girl who was working. To your surprise, she looks right down at you and reaches down to pick you up. "Thank god! Can you help me!" You beg her.

"What are you anyway? Like some little freak of nature?" She says a little confused. "I don't really wanna get myself into this, a tiny teenager is the last thing I wanna deal with." She says as she just tosses you behind her.

You scream as you soar through the air, looking down at the whole store as you flew. You closed your eyes hoping to land somewhere safely, you finally fall and land somewhere. You open your eyes to see you had landed...
155.title: The Women Clothing Store

choices: She applies the lipstick, smothering and sticking you to her lips.
She applies the lipstick, but you fall right off her lips.
"Ewww" She says flicking you off the lipstick right into a trash can.
1552.content:
You had landed in inside a lipstick container on a shelf full of lipsticks, You move around it and accidentally back up into a left open lipstick.

You realize you were on lipstick so you tried to pull your tiny body away, it was quite hard due to how sticky it was. You pulled hard away from the sticky substance once but you slipped backwards, smothering your whole body into the lipstick. All you could smell was the cherry scent on the lipstick, your whole body was covered in the pink color as well.

Suddenly you hear the booms of footsteps as an employee was looking overhead at the lipsticks, picking up the one you were on.
"Better put this cap back on." She says as brings the cap in towards you.
"No! wait!" You yell but it's no use as the cap covers over the lipstick and you were trapped inside, stuck to the lipstick.

The employee then tosses you back into the lipstick container, you were stuck there for hours. Every hour that passed you just dried into the lipstick more and more, until eventually you were lifted up and were moved and shaken in the lipstick. This lasts for a while until you see the light of day as a giant girl opens up the lipstick.

"Oh my god, this looks so cute." Her voice booms as she closes it back up with you still stuck to the lipstick, you didn't get a good view at her.

It was 30 minutes until the cap lifts off again and you enjoy the freedom, you look around to see you were in a bathroom. In front of you was a mirror and there was a giant girl in front of it ready to apply the lipstick you had on, You gulp as she wouldn't notice you on the lipstick because you were all pink from the color getting on you.
1552.title: Stuck On Giant Lipstick

choices: She takes a sip of a drink, making you fall right into the cup she drank from.
She kisses another girl, basically transferring you between them.
She gets onto a trampoline, making you fall right off her lips onto it.
15521.content:
The giant girl brings the lipstick to her face as she puckers up her lips, you watch as you get closer and closer towards her lips.

You got a good look at her from your angle though, she was about 16 (Your age), and was probably 6'0 (1 inch shorter than your normal height), she had long kinda curly black hair, big lips, nice trimmed eyebrows, kinda tan skin, and a skinny frame with average curves. She was wearing a brown shirt with black leggings.

It felt like forever as she slowly moved the lipstick to her face, finally smothering you into her lips. You struggled between the lipstick end and the giant girl's lips as it dragged you across, her lips were huge and soft but it still was too much to be pushed into them. You eventually were left behind on the giant girl's lips, a little stuck to it.

You pull one arm free from her lips and started pushing against her lip in order to get off until her lipstick came back, applying another layer of lipstick basically gluing you to her lower lip. You were completely stuck to her lip and couldn't move at all, you could barely even see as your face was glued into her lip as well.

The girl thought her new lipstick looked cute, she admired it in the mirror for a bit. She started to pucker her lips, smushing you into her other lip as well. Then she closed her lips a little to salivate them, wettening you in her saliva which added to you getting stuck on her lip. With that, she just walked out of the bathroom, with a tiny boy stuck to her lip.

She walked out of the bathroom, she was at a house party. You heard the booming of music from speakers as she walked through the party with you attached to her lip.
15521.title: Stuck To Giantess Lips

choices: Katie got off the trampoline, leaving you with Rachel.
Both Katie and Rachel laid down, looking up at the sky.
You flew far off into the backyard they had, landing onto something.
155213.content:
You weren't able to see much from your position but you could feel the giant girl heading towards something and getting onto it, and suddenly she was high in the air with you still on her lip.

You realize she was bouncing on a trampoline with another girl, just casually having some fun. You were still stuck to the girl's lower lip but every jump she took shook you a little off her lip, making it feel like you had a chance to get off. But you weren't ready to fall the height from her lip to the trampoline ground, thinking the fall would literally kill you.

The girl suddenly did a front flip on the trampoline making you fly off her lip towards the other girl's thigh and bouncing off that onto the trampoline. You had faceplanted onto the ground, still a little bit covered in pink from the lipstick. You get up while no one was jumping all look up at the two giant girls towering over you talking.

There was the black haired girl whos lip you were just on, and then there was a brown-haired girl as well. She looks to be around 16 as well (Your age), and was 6'1 (your normal height), she had long straight brown hair and some freckles, she had a skinny frame with huge curves. She was wearing a brown tank top with very ripped blue jeans.

You heard their conversations for a bit and realized the black haired girl whos lip you were on was called "Katie" and the brown-haired girl was named "Rachel."

It was a while of them standing around and not jumping so you had to move quick, you were in the middle of the trampoline right between them. But you were too late as they both started jumping, each time launching you what felt like 60 feet in the air but to them was 6 feet. You screamed as you soar high up into the air and crashed right into the trampoline surface again, you weren't dying. You must have been immortal or something at this size if you could survive several 60 feet falls.

It was intense jumping for a while between Katie and Rachel until...
155213.title: Bouncing Around the Trampoline

choices: You fall through one of the rips in the jeans.
She gets off with you holding onto her ass.
She continues jumping with you on her ass.
1552131.content:
You were absolutely exhausted from the jumping that was sending you flying until it stopped, you heard loud shifting and look up to see Katie, the girl whos lip you were stuck to earlier, was leaving the trampoline. She was leaving you with this new giant Girl, who you knew as Rachel.

Rachel was just sitting down on the trampoline scrolling through her phone quickly, the perfect time to get her attention. You run up to her side and look up at her absolutely towering over you, like a skyscraper. Before you could even attempt to get her attention she stood up, making the force on the trampoline knock you over.

You look up at her as she does a giant jump in the air, and goes down. To your absolute horror, she was heading directly towards you. It looked like she would completely crush your body at the force she was going, you turn around and start running.

She lands and you fly right from underneath her safely onto another spot on the trampoline, you breathe heavily at the terrifying thing that just occurred. You were launched a couple of feet in the air as she kept jumping, sending you around the trampoline. Once again you had landed nearby her, you attempt to dodge each of landing of hers on the trampoline.

Rachel stops for a second just to do a high jump, knocking you on the ground from the force. You look up and see her land full force right next to you, launching you up. You soar through the air and look down terrified as you fall towards Rachel, landing right onto her ass. You were holding onto her ripped jeans for dear life.
1552131.title: On Trampoline With Rachel

choices: It's no use, you are put on alongside her clothes.
She notices you, and walks over to grab you.
You fall accidentally on something below, she leaves and someone else comes in.
1553.content:
You land inside the changing room, you look around and see you were on the soft chair in the changing room. You thought you might've flown in from over the top of the door.

You see a giant girl right in front of you, she was like a skyscraper to you. There were clothes in her arms so you think she was already leaving, when she opened the door you were able to see a pretty long line of people waiting to use the changing room you were in. You had never seen a line for a changing room so it was pretty crazy.

As the giant girl leaves another girl walks right in with her clothes, closing the door behind her. She begins to take off her clothes and you look away not wanting to feel like a creep, was it even worth it to try to get her attention at all? She would probably immediately dismiss you as a creep if she saw you.

The girl who had walked in kinda looked like real life Pocahontas from that Disney movie. She looked to be about 17, she was about 6'2 in height (1 inch taller than your normal height), she had long straight black hair, looked native American, had big lips, with a skinny frame but had big curves. With all that, she was wearing a white t-shirt and short jean shorts. But now she was taking it off to try the other clothes on.

She put on different clothes to try and threw the ones she was wearing in your direction, you were knocked over by her gigantic jean shorts. You get out from underneath a little dazed from having those thrown at your little half an inch tall body, you walk towards her and realize you were standing in her clothes.

Suddenly you are pulled up and set on a clothing hanger as she was about to put back on her clothes she was wearing, there was no way of you to jump off. You had to get her attention now before you would end up in her clothing, you look over at her changing and try to yell for her attention.

"Help! I'm stuck on your clothes! Please help!" You yell.
1553.title: Inside The Changing Rooms

info.brief_description: A Teenager shrinks when he was on vacation during the Summer (Feel Free To Add On!)
info.description:
Please leave a Positive review if you liked the story, Good reviews are what makes me continue adding more and more options to this interactive because then it'll do better. I'd appreciate it so much if you could take the time to do it for only 30 seconds.

Your name is Denis, You are 16. You were vacationing with some friends during the summer and drove all the way down to a place in Florida where it was the hotspot for travel, people were going in and out vacationing.

You suddenly shrink to what you would say is no taller than half an inch, you were tiny! What would happen next? The choice is yours.

(It's very stressful to be the only one adding to the story with alot of detail, if possible please add your own addition. I award points to a lot of people who do, together we can make this a super long interactive.)

Read Before Adding Please:

Keep the main character alive as much as possible, Please do not add any males, stick to female characters mostly.

Do not make the Character some Pervert or Sex Fiend, He is scared of being shrunk and really doesn't want to be doing anything sexual despite the girls wanting to.

Please add a physical description of new characters, such as: Age, Hair color, Body type (EX:big thighs, Skinny figure, ass size, breast size, Etc).

Please do not include Excessive use of Vore and Feet (Its allowed but not too much), and Anyone younger than 15 and older than 19. Anything Else is good unless it's over the top weird (Morbid Obesity, Anything super violent, etc)

Have actual readable writing with good punctuation and sentences, small errors are easily changeable but if its too much errors I may delete the post altogether.

Use Common Sense for when you are writing Additions. Make sure to have no run on sentences and write in paragraphs, do not have one giant paragraph for your addition.

Use Spell Check or fix it with Grammar if possible, Its free on the chrome web store.

Also try your best to keep the story to Second Person Writing (You, Your, You're) and that's the last thing you need to know, just have fun.

If anyone would like to Roleplay privately with me, here are some socials I use we can roleplay on:
Kik: @TinyDenis
Deviantart: https://www.deviantart.com/denisisonfire
Discord: Denis!#0771
